<<<<<<< HEAD
A short instruction for the better understanding and performing of mental prayer Abercromby, Christopher.
[2], xiv, 49, [1] p.
Printed ... by L. Sevestre, over against Graffin College, Paris : M DC XCI [i.e. 1691]
Attributed to Christopher Abercromby by Wing. Preface signed: C.A.S.I. [i.e. Christopher Abercromby, Society of Jesus?]. Includes first page of preface in French on [1] p. at end. Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
=======
